text_block_list.name: Young Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, Brian. The doctor says I<n>can't run with you for a
while.

text_block_list.name: Young Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Young Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But there are lots of other people you<n>can race with. So
don't worry about<n>me—go have fun.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Brian... You're toofast!

text_block_list.name: Young Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna run even faster next time.<n>So let's do another
lap.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
G-gimme a break! You might be<n>having fun 'cause you're
winning, but<n>I'm not!

text_block_list.name: Young Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... You're too fast... I... Ihate you!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
U-um... Brian, do you wanna try racing<n>lessons? I bet there
are lots of fast<n>runners there.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several years later, in racing class...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Racing Instructor A
text_block_list.text:
That Narita Brian runs very well. I<n>heard she hasn't been
able to settle<n>anywhere, though.

text_block_list.name: Racing Instructor B
text_block_list.text:
Huh, I can't imagine why. One look at<n>her talent and anyone
would be sorry<n>to miss out on having her.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: I... quit... This sucks. Why's sucha fast kid here, anyway?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(Not again! Why don't you try harder?<n>This is a race! But
you just...)

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: I caaan't... Ugh, this is hopeless, no<n>matter how hard I try.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm leaving after today.

text_block_list.name: Racing Instructor A
text_block_list.text:
B-but why?! I'm sure our class was<n>much better than your
last! Our track is<n>near professional level—you can't<n>find a
higher quality experience<n>elsewhere!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Forget it. This place isn't a challenge<n>anymore... It's
pointless when<n>everyone else has lost their drive to<n>win.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There you are, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Sis.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Come to Tracen Academy. That's<n>where you'll find real
racing. It may<n>just satisfy that hunger of yours.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And they're off! First out of the gate<n>is number six!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Number eight, Narita Brian, is waiting<n>for the perfect
opportunity to break<n>ahead! But number six's lead keeps<n>
growing!

text_block_list.name: Number Six Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Haaagh!

text_block_list.name: Number Six Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wha...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (Is it really happening here too?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
No matter where I go, no matter who I<n>challenge, it's always
the same. I'm<n>left feeling hungrier than before.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I guess there's no point in staying<n>here...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's no better way to collect your<n>thoughts than a stroll,
so I go to the<n>riverside for some contemplation.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text: You're really going to do this?

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah... I never want to fail like that<n>again. That's why...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the senior student who raced<n>against Narita Brian. I
suppose this is<n>one of her training spots.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. May I have a word?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I didn't mean to take you by<n>surprise. I'm Biwa
Hayahide, Narita<n>Brian's sister.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I've heard stories about your many<n>stubborn attempts to
speak with her.<n>So when I saw you here, I had to<n>come
talk to you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
There's no need to be nervous. I'd<n>just like a few minutes
of your time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Phew. Time for a cooldown.Would you write down my latest timewith the blue pen?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I know it, I'm helping Biwa<n>Hayahide with her
training.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. This will make excellent<n>data. That wind sprint
you suggested<n>was effective as well. I'm always<n>looking
for ways to improve.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
More importantly, you kept me<n>company until this late hour,
meaning<n>you put your trainees first... Yes, I<n>think you'll do
well.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Shall we move on to the main topic of<n>discussion?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Forgive me. I wanted to test you.<n>According to my
hypothesis, one's<n>attitude toward training also<n>expresses
who they are as a person.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm well aware of my discourtesy,<n>but I simply had to know
for<n>sure—whether or not I can place my<n>hopes in you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I would like to ask that you<n>accompany Narita Brian to my
debut<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You see, I heard a concerning rumor<n>making the rounds. If
it's true, I want<n>her to see a real race...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Before she leaves the academy for<n>good.
